column4: I ran the upgrade command and it came up with "sudo apt-get install -f"
I ran that and it came up with command not found any uiggestions?
From 7.04 to 8
I ran Synaptic and it said that i have 2 broken packages...how do I access the Broken filter?
Any body got some ideas on that?
In applications?
How do I find out?
Or where do I go to find out?
find out what
run them separately
ok will do
Ok I ran the update process and then it came up with E: Unable to lock the administration directory (/var/lib/dpkg/), is another process using it?
so what do I need to do next
close add/remove or synaptic and try again
Great I did that and this is what came up E: Unmet dependencies. Try using -f.
then run that command
I ran that command and it came up with >
Now what do I type?
http://www.cyberciti.biz/ref/apt-dpkg-ref.html
sudo apt-get install -f
Thanks it seems to be working now thank yo for your support it's much appreciated
nicely done
I found the broken packages and fixed them
This is my very first time with Ubuntu I have a friend who got me Fedora 9 and I'm not sure about using it...and I ran into someone today who is a developer and recomended I stick with Ubuntu
